meanings.definition: The person who presides over a meeting or organization.
meanings.sent1: The chairmans led the meeting with confidence.
meanings.sent2: The chairmans announced the start of the meeting.
meanings.sent3: The chairmans joked about starting a dance party during the meeting.
meanings.sent4: The chairmans steered the meeting like a skilled captain navigating a ship.
meanings.sent5: The chairmans wore a top hat to stand out and be easily recognized by everyone.

meanings.definition: The act of presiding over a meeting or organization.
meanings.sent1: The chairmans of the organization ensured everyone had a chance to speak.
meanings.sent2: The chairmans of the meeting maintained order throughout.
meanings.sent3: The chairmans of the meeting pretended to be a superhero with special meeting-presiding powers.
meanings.sent4: The chairmans of the organization held the meeting together like glue.
meanings.sent5: The chairmans of the meeting used a gavel to emphasize important points.
